title: For those shitting themselves about pool party rewards, I have something to say

replies.body: BAHAHAHA Nasus* <3, what now im confused coz it looks like u spelt it the other way round u troll xD
Her name is SUSAN :) classic MR NAEB such a silly potato.{{champion:17}}
whats with the silly potato teemo comment xD, n i know Susan xD, if were talking about the same show/thing xD

Meh, already did a 5 man premade. I'm all good for the rewards :)

Even though League isn't working for me atm

> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AZ2KvkEO,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-06-22T10:41:40.472+0000)
>
> Meh, already did a 5 man premade. I'm all good for the rewards :)
> 
> Even though League isn't working for me atm

My laptop is broken but I went with a 5 man premade and won a couple games so I'm not that scared right now. If I don't get the rewards when my laptop gets fixed...Rito plz slower than the OCE skin.
My computer isn't even broken though. The login screen isn't loading from me, so I'm stuck playing Spore and stuff while I wait for Rito to help me fix it.
Without those rewards ... my life is pointless.
only thing i want is the pool party minions rest of rewards doesn't phase me slightly
